text: Kohat Tehsil railway station () is located in Pakistan. Kohat Express is operated from this Station on daily basis, Named as Kohat Express. This train Departs Kohat Daily at 7am and returns from Rawalpindi at 3:30 pm daily. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Kohat District
title: Kohat Tehsil railway station
